## bulktrends User Guide

Examples of how to use the `bulktrends` package. First, let's load all of the functions contained within the package.

```{r}
#| code-fold: true

library(data.table)
library(devtools)
devtools::load_all("../")
```

## Load UK Trade Info Bulk Data Files

Load a single bulk data file or all of the files in a directory (an subdirectories).

```{r}
read_uktradeinfo( path = "../data/imports/Imports 2016/")
```

## Request Data from UK Trade Data API

Simple example...

```{r}
uktrades_request()

```
